page.title: 16My Hobby in Woodlesford
page.content: My hobby is going horse riding.I go every Saturday and I really enjoy it. I ride on a horse called Skippy,she is a chestnut coloured horse and she has lovely sad brown eyes.I go to Royds Hall J & C Riding School.My friend Deborah rides a horse called Adam who is a lovely brown horse.We sometimes have jumps put out for us.We trot around the field doing rise and trot and sitting trot.Then she would ask us to canter around the field one by one. We finish our lesson at 1-0-clock,I lead Skippy into her stable and I take her bridle off,I then give her a polo and a big pat.I have ridden on a big horse called Shannon.
